thread.title: Report: Beyoncé still intends to headline Coachella despite pregnancy
thread.title_full: Report: Beyoncé still intends to headline Coachella despite pregnancy

title: Report: Beyoncé still intends to headline Coachella despite pregnancy
text:
Reddit 
The revelation of Beyoncé ’s pregnancy caught many by surprise, Coachella organizers included. 
In January, the singer was announced as a headliner of this year’s festival. At that time and up until yesterday, festival organizers were unaware she was pregnant with twins, according to TMZ . 
TMZ adds that Goldenvoice, the company behind Coachella, has attempted to reach out to Beyoncé’s representatives for more details, including how far along she is in her pregnancy. However, as of Thursday, they’ve yet to hear back. 
Nevertheless, TMZ reports that Beyoncé still intends to headline the festival in April as long as the pregnancy goes as planned. Goldenvoice is not actively looking for a replacement headliner. 
Coachella goes down over two weekends, April 14th – 16th and 21st – 23rd, in Indio, California. Artists
